website_summaries.verdict: This boat fender is surprisingly affordable, especially given the quality of its construction and its durability.
pros: Made of high-quality vinyl with built-in ribbing for extra durability
Lasts a long time as long as you do not overinflate
cons: Users have said that the color choices displayed online don't match the colors they received

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of the 6.5 x 23 boat bumpers. They are big and will work well for my boat. They appear to be made well and durable. If anything changes I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M

customer_reviews.title: Great bumper for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Our lake has been getting rougher over the years (wake board boats) so we needed a more adequately sized bumper to protect our boat when tied up in the dock. So far they have survived the worst day of our boating year (4th of July) and they are holding up great. This form factor works better than the ball shaped bumpers we used previously.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaJeff

customer_reviews.title: Looks like they are good quality
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is suppose to do. A little soft but you can add air. Looks like they are good quality. Don't forget to buy the rope !
customer_reviews.author: YanYan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: The boat bumper is exactly as advertised and was received in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R. Ross

customer_reviews.title: after using the product I found that it worked great because of the docks
customer_reviews.text: Ii was concerned about the size when I ordered, but, after using the product I found that it worked great because of the docks, they are older and the 6" works perfectly. They have good color and are really nice to show off when pulling into the dock.
customer_reviews.author: richard l wallgren sr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These bumpers are a bit large for my 18.5 foot center console (6x22), but I've grown to like the larger size. If storage on your boat is limited, stick with the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Warriordude15

customer_reviews.title: Item As Described works great..
customer_reviews.text: Item As Described works great...! I have 4 of these they are good quality and have held up well for going on 2 boating seasons now...!
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Great Size for our Bigger Boat!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and quality. Just make sure to check them once you receive. Bought as Christmas present and didn't open until closer to boat season and one was damaged. Was replaced by Amazon with no hassle though
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Originally I thought these were going to be to large ...
customer_reviews.text: Originally I thought these were going to be to large, but once I took them down to the boat they were the exact size needed.
customer_reviews.author: Critterman

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great bouys. A little squishy which is the way I like them! I'd recommend them to any prospective buyers! They are pretty big but work just fine in our 20' ski boat.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K

customer_reviews.title: i will update this in 2 or so weeks after I get a chance to use them.  From an appearance standpoint, they seems really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet, review based off look and feel
customer_reviews.author: RichG

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 23ft boat. It works well; we don't have any problems with it. I bought two of them, but I only really use one.
customer_reviews.author: MAKNikNak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price will be buy two more.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Shoreline Marine Inflatable Fender
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it - just got a new pontoon, so he is really excited on all the items we ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: however I would have liked the next size up
customer_reviews.text: They did the job, however I would have liked the next size up, 8-in.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Huset

product_meta.title: Shoreline Marine Inflatable Fender 6.5 X 23 Wht
product_meta.description: Inflatable fender offers exceptional performance season after season. Featuring premium vinyl construction with UV inhibitors fender will not let you down.
feature_bullets: Great For Salt Or Fresh Water

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
